SELECT user_id, account, user_name, type, status, org_id, create_by, create_time FROM sys_user
AND account LIKE CONCAT('%', #{account}, '%')
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE account = #{account}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND org_id = #{orgId}
SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE account = #{account} AND org_id = #{orgId} AND status = 1

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE u.account = #{account} AND u.status = 1 AND ur.role_id IS NOT NULL AND rm.menu_id IS NOT NULL AND m.status = 1 AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != ''
